description: SEO mentor aligned with Google's best practices
curatorsnotes: This is a great - if simple - GPT. I have used it to get feedback on my technical implementations of SEO-related topics. Here, you see me inquiring about a backlinking strategy, which I was completely unfamiliar with. Now I feel like I have a solid foundation of knowledge applicable to my specific use case. That is why you should check out all the links in the description!
